title: IE cost more than Morello and is less gold efficent and offer less stas
body:
Ie cost more and takes more time to scale up compared to morello. IE is not even at the level of cost efficency with its passive when compared to morello without its passive. How is it fair that Morello offers so much as a first item. I Guess you could argue that its for mages so its allowed 
to be broken. Can you imagine how good ie would be if it offers ad crit and atk speed and lifesteal all at once?

Hehe xd
